text:
A young man stepped out of his small garret. 

He hesitated on the staircase. 

He avoided his landlady. 

The evening was exceptionally hot. 

He walked slowly toward K. bridge. 

His room felt like a cupboard. 

He thought of his life. 

It weighed heavily on him. 

He needed to escape. 

He took a deep breath and continued.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man hesitates as he leaves his cramped garret on a hot July evening.
